text: Valentin Gorelkin (born 25 March 1937) is a Soviet equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1972 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:Soviet male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of the Soviet Union Category:Equestrians at the 1972 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Valentin Gorelkin
